description:
Are you ready to take your Tormentor experience to the next level? With the DLC Tormentor-Action Fire, you can supercharge your in-game earnings and become a true champion in no time. 
     Unlock a world of opportunities as you watch your in-game wealth skyrocket. With increased earnings, you'll have the power to customize your character like never before, acquiring the most epic weapon and gear to make your presence on the battlefield truly legendary.
name: Tormentor-Action Fire (DLC)
